posts.post_title: No longer needed-WTB New York Americans -Thanks
posts.post_content:
Special thanks to board members for their help to complete my Yankee team sets……I now have them all !!!!

T205……Chase (one ear)
T205……Ray Fischer
T205……Russ Ford  (White cap)
T205……Russ Ford (black cap)
T205……Jeff Sweeney
T202……Chase guarding first,  Chase/Walter
